shortcontents.shortcontent: UM-30 ff. 3rv: 1 Sam 24:15-25:14 UM-30 ff. 4rv, 15r-16v, 18r-25v, 36rv: Life of Qirqos UM-30 ff. 5r-7r: Homily of Theophilus, bishop of Aksum, on the wedding at Cana UM-30 ff. 7r-9v: Homily by Athanasius of Alexandria on the Incarnation of the Word (in full) UM-30 ff. 9v-12v: 53vr: Homily by Minas, bishop of Aksum, on the Dormition of Mary UM-30 ff. 13rv: Homily by Minas, bishop of Aksum, for the feast of the 70 disciples and the 318 Orthodox from Nicea UM-30 f. 13v: Homily by Cyril of Alexandria for the feast of John the Evangelist UM-30 ff. 14rv: Homily by John Chrysostom on the Annunciation of Gabriel to Mary, for the second Sunday of Taḫśaś UM-30 ff. 17rv, 27rv: Life of George FOLIATION SKIPS FROM 25 to 27 UM-30 ff. 28r-29v, 31rv, 35rv: Story of the appearance of the Cross to Constantine UM-30 ff. 30rv: Lives of Sergius and Bacchus UM-30 ff. 32vr: Martyrdom of Aretha UM-30 ff. 33rv: passage from Zechariah UM-30 ff. 34vr: Homily of Jacob of Serug on the Nativity, to be read on the commemoration of the holy innocents UM-30 ff. 37rv: Homily on the great spiritual Easter UM-30 ff. 38rv: Lament of Mary UM-30 ff. 39rv: Homily on Mary for 3 Taḫśaś UM-30 f. 40v: Homily for the third Saturday in Lent UM-30 ff. 40vr: Homily by Jacob of Serug for the third Sunday in Lent UM-30 ff. 41rv: Homily on the suffering of Jesus for Monday in Easter-week UM-30 ff. 42r-47r: Matthew 26:75-28:20 UM-30 ff. 47rv: Chapters for Mark, incomplete UM-30 ff. 48rv: Matt 25:11-26 UM-30 ff. 49rv: Matt 24:[29]-42 UM-30 ff. 50rv: Matt 26:[17]-29 UM-30 ff. 51r-52v: Mark 1:1-[19] (both fragments belong to the same leaf) (Ted Erho, 28.06.2015)
